title: Staatskapelle Berlin, Daniel Barenboim
content:
Description 

Konzerthaus Berlin presents Argentine pianist and conductor Daniel Barenboim who will perform Ludwig van Beethoven's Konzert für Klavier und Orchester Nr. 2 B-Dur op. 19 and Edward Elgar's Sinfonie Nr. 1 As-Dur op. 55.  Recipient of many awards and prizes, including an honorary Knight Commander of the Order of the British Empire, Daniel is a virtuoso indeed.
